markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced Arcana](/Feats.aspx?ID=746) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 231 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Wizard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=12)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Arcana](/Feats.aspx?ID=744)

</column>

---

You gain one [wizard feat](/Classes.aspx?ID=12/feats). For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your wizard level is equal to half your character level.

**Special** You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another wizard feat.
name: Advanced Arcana
